short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension creates raindrops on the new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension creates raindrop graphics on the new tab page. It is customizable, with the ability to change the rain, background, and search bar color. You are also able to change how fast the rain falls. It is just a fun little extension to brighten up your browsing experience!
